caption.p: Changes in annual mean air temperature (shading) during 2076–2095 relative to 1986–2005 and multi-model standard deviation (contour) under ( a) RCP2.6, ( c) RCP4.5, and ( e) RCP8.5. ( g) shows the corresponding range of projected spatially averaged increases in annual mean temperature over global land based on the results of CMIP5 GCMs used. Panels ( b, d, f, h): same as ( a, c, e, g) except for annual mean W.
